content.body: https://github.com/WebKit/standards-positions/issues/140#issuecomment-1461388677 indicates that WebKit has a bucket-based privacy mechanism for `navigator.languages`. Where can I read a description of the mechanism?
content.formatted_body: https://github.com/WebKit/standards-positions/issues/140#issuecomment-1461388677 indicates that WebKit has a bucket-based privacy mechanism for navigator.languages. Where can I read a description of the mechanism?

content.body: I got as far as https://github.com/WebKit/WebKit/blob/main/Source/WTF/wtf/Language.cpp#L98, seems promising
AFAICT, the actual minimization happens in `minimizedLanguagesFromLanguages` of `NSLocale`. Is that a private undocumented API?
content.formatted_body: AFAICT, the actual minimization happens in minimizedLanguagesFromLanguages of NSLocale. Is that a private undocumented API?
